name: Esper (itch)
description:
CO-OP 2D roguelike dungeon crawler themed around a 6th sense!

Esper is a dungeon crawler game in which you have to traverse a dark dungeon lingering with threats, our twist on the genre is the need of a buddy to help you out on your journey, one will be the eyes, one will be the hands.

Controls (Keyboard):

  • Esper - WASD & SPACE 
  • Ghost - ARROWS / MOUSE.

Controls (Controller):

  • Esper - Left joystick & X
  • Ghost - WASD & MOUSE
